name: Slap Warriors
description:
Slap or be slapped: that’s the main idea of the game! This amusing and relaxing game will test your strength and timing skills so your smack generates the most power! Your hits will pack a punch. Watch your opponents flying out when you hit the knockout blow. How far do you think you can get in this face slapping good time tournament?

Easy to learn but surprising depth will provide you with hours of entertainment. More than 100 characters are just asking to get slapped in the face.
